item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: 0. Introduction The datasets that I have chosen are both from the New York City open datasets database. One is a survey of the demographics and SES attributes of schools in Manhattan, and the other is an assessment of the amount of space students at schools across Manhattan have for physical education, as well as what types of physical education spaces are available to them and whether these spaces are shared.

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: library(tidyverse) gyms <- read_csv("ny_gym_school_data.csv") #first, exclude outdoor spaces bc much likelier to be large and unshared - will skew samples gyms <- gyms %>% filter(location == "Inside") gyms <- gyms %>% filter(gym_room_function != 'SWIMMING POOL') nrow(gyms) ## [1] 5243 The dataset I will be using in this project is the same one I used for my last project, which was a combination of two datasets from the New York City Open Data database.
